shri lankawe prathamawarata pawathwena dakunu aasiyathika weralabada krida ulela okthobar masa 8 dina sita 17 dina dakwa hambanthota di pawathwena athara ema tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wana kridaka kridakayan me dinawala puhunu katayuthuwala nirathawala bawa krida amathyansha madhya lekam harsha bi abekon mahatha pawasayi.tharaga isaw 10k ilakka karagena pawathwena dakunu aasiyathika weralabada krida ulela sandaha shri lankawa, indiyawa, bangladeshaya, nepalaya, maladiwayina, afganisthanaya, pakisthanaya tharaga wadina athara netbol, wolibol, baskatbol, athpandu, kabadi, thuranga, pihinum, ruwal oru, papandu kayawardhana tharaga isaw sandaha shri lankawa tharaga wadi.weralabada krida tharagawalin salakiya yuthu jayagrahanayak laba ganima sandaha shri lankawa wisheshayen netbol, wolibol, baskatbol, athpandu, kayawardhana yana tharaga isaw sandaha me dinawala puhunuwim katayuthu sidu karana bawa awadharanaya karana krida amathyanshaya sesu tharagawalin da jayagrahanaya apeksha karana bawa madhya lekamwaraya pawasiya.okthobar masa pawathwena weralabada krida tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wana shri lanka kridaka kridikawo me dinawala migamuwa, galkissa yana pradeshawala weralabada puhunu katayuthu sidu karamin sitithi..

eheth, lewiwaru ikman no wu ha. 6 ewita raja thema pradhaniya wana jehoyada kandawa, ”samindanan wahansege mehekaru wu moses da ishrayel sabhawa da wisin sammukha mandapaya udesa niyama karana lada badu mila lewiwarun wisin juda deshayen saha jerusalamen ekathu kara genenu labana hatiyata oba waga bala nogaththe manda”yi asi ya. 7 manda dushta wu athaliya saha age puthrayan dewiyan wahansege maligawa kada, un wahansege maligawe kapa wu siyalu dewal bal dewathawan udesa pawichchiyata gena gos thibunu heyini. 8 thawada, pettiyak sada samindanan wahansege maligawe dorakada pitathin thabana lesa raja ana kele ya. 9 ewita dewiyan wahansege mehekaruwa wu moses palukaraye di ishrayelwarunta niyama kala badda samindanan wahanse udesa genenna kiya judahi saha jerusalamehi prasiddha karana ladde ya. 10 ewita siyalu adhipathihu da mulu senanga da santhosha wa, badu gewa nima wana thuru mudal genawuth pettiye dammo ya. 11 meyakarayen ee pettiya lewiwarun lawa raja bhandagarayata genwana witath, boho mudal thibena bawa dakina witath, rajuge lekam da uththama pujakayage sewakaya da awuth pettiya hiskara, eya nawatha gena gos palamu thibunu thana thabu ha.

kiyak da kiyala ahuwama tikak hithata baya hithunath kohoma hari karannama hithuwa.dawasak athulatha siyalu mudal soya gannath ooni ne.mokada ee minissu wadi dawasak ee saththu thiya ganna kamathi na..kotinma brahaspathinda, apita ooni senasurada awth geniyanawa kiwwama sikurada dawase saththu dennata kama hoyala ewannath kiyala kiwwa.namuth ee kiwwa mila hugak wadi hinda boma amaruwen gana 40 000 kata adu karagaththa.pataw wunath naki wunath kiri dena amma kenek wunath wassek wunath mila kiyanne mas barata..ane apoyi wunath eka ehemayi..me wada walata mata yanna wune na wishwa widyala wada asse..eth pandige massina ee kiyanne ape lakshaman ayiya hugak udaw kala nisa wade keruna.
